Cogitatio

Cogitatio is a suite of plugins for Unreal Engine that operate independently of each other, but are capable of empowering each other and exposing new features when present.

  • Aer
  • Auxilium
  • Capsa
  • Fera
  • Hora
  • Medela
  • Proicio
  • Proprium
  • Qualitas
  • Rector
  • Sensus
  • Stirpis
  • Tabula
  • Visus

Visus

sight, vision, seeing

Visus is a camera managment and interaction plugin. Visus aims to make handling complex camera setups simpler to maintain, while enabling various effects and techniques commonly found in games and movies.

This project/site is maintained by Derjyn
